notableProjects.title: Solution Architect and Team Lead for San Francisco based startup
notableProjects.tech: Python, AWS, React, Typescript, Software architecture, TDD, Agile, Scrum
description: Through my dual responsibilities as a Solution Architect and Team Leader, I coordinated the efforts of the engineering team, driving them towards the successful delivery of an ad-hoc solution that met the client's requirements.

As a Solution Architect, I actively participated in meetings with the startup CEO, my US team counterpart, and other stakeholders to collaboratively design both locally hosted and cloud-based solutions.

Additionally, as a Team Leader, I employed Agile methodologies to guide and support my team throughout the development process. This involved reviewing Pull Requests, facilitating Test Driving Development, and writing code in Python and TypeScript.

notableProjects.title: Senior full-stack developer for a worldwide sport event
description: During my tenure, I contributed to the development of the primary website for a prestigious global sports event scheduled for 2020 (subsequently postponed to 2021).

Initially, I joined as a senior frontend developer, where I played a crucial role in integrating third-party news feeds, advertising elements, and a multimedia gallery as well providing assistance to fellow team members.

As my responsibilities expanded, I began working on the backend as well, implemented new website sections, optimizing the indexing and search engine capabilities within the client's proprietary framework.

notableProjects.title: Full-stack developer for a US assurance company
description: I worked as full-stack developer on a insurance quoting web application targeted to medium and small business for a Fortune top 10 assurance company, refactoring an old Java monolith application into a micro-services based one, using Clojure, RabbitMQ and Jenkins to increase the maintanibility and the ease of deploy; we also created an ad-hoc git flow to better manage the project.

notableProjects.title: Interactive YouTube Masthead for an italian fashion brand
description: I created an engaging YouTube Masthead that featured an interactive element. This unique masthead presented two versions of the same commercial simultaneously, with one playing on the top half and the other on the bottom. To provide an interactive experience, I implemented a draggable divider line that allowed users to select which video and music they wanted to watch simply by dragging it up and down.
